meta.title: Best Family Dogs: Top Breeds for Kids & Active Homes
meta.description: Looking for the perfect family dog? We've ranked the top breeds based on patience, energy, and trainability to help you find your new best friend.

hero.title: Best Family Dogs
hero.subtitle: Finding a dog that loves your kids as much as you do.

intro: Adding a dog to your family is a big decision. You need a breed that is patient, sturdy enough to handle playtime, and gentle enough to cuddle. We've analyzed hundreds of breeds to find the absolute best matches for family life.

items.description: The gold standard for family dogs. They are incredibly patient, eager to please, and sturdy enough to play with kids of all ages.
America's favorite dog for a reason. Labs are playful, protective, and loving. Just be ready for lots of shedding and energy!
